channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling Connect:Direct for UNIX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling Connect:Direct for UNIX

item.title: CVE-2020-4747|2024-08-04T08:14:58.484Z -- ibm -- sterling%20connect%3Adirect%20for%20unix
item.description: IBM Connect:Direct for UNIX 6.1.0, 6.0.0, 4.3.0, and 4.2.0 can allow a local or remote user to obtain an authenticated CLI session due to improper authentication methods. IBM X-Force ID: 188516.

item.title: CVE-2020-4587|2024-08-04T08:07:49.055Z -- ibm -- sterling%20connect%3Adirect%20for%20unix
item.description: IBM Sterling Connect:Direct for UNIX 4.2.0, 4.3.0, 6.0.0, and 6.1.0 is vulnerable to a stack based buffer ovreflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A local attacker could manipulate CD UNIX to obtain root provileges. IBM X-Force ID: 184578.
